original_text: and performed signs and wonders against Pharaoh and all his servants and all the people of his land, for you knew that they acted arrogantly against our fathers. And you made a name for yourself, as it is to this day.
korean_text: 이적과 기사를 베푸사 바로와 그의 모든 신하와 그의 나라 온 백성을 치셨사오니 이는 그들이 우리의 조상들에게 교만하게 행함을 아셨음이라 주께서 오늘과 같이 명예를 얻으셨나이다

sentences.original_text: against Pharaoh and all his servants
and all the people of his land
for you knew that they acted arrogantly
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 오만하게 행동함을 당신이 아셨음이라

sentences.original_text: And you made a name for yourself
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 당신을 위한 명성을 만드셨으니

sentences.original_text: as it is to this day
